author: RTÉ News
title: 'I'm watching you' - De Niro and DeVito say stay home
description: At the request of the New York Governor's Office, acting veterans Danny DeVito and Robert De Niro have put out Public Service Announcements on the coronavirus, asking people to stay at home.
content:
At the request of the New York Governor's Office, acting veterans Danny DeVito and Robert De Niro have put out Public Service Announcements on the coronavirus, asking people to stay at home.
DeVito told people in his video, which has amassed nearly three mil… [+311 chars]
